basics.name: Jane Smith
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Passionate software engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Specialized in modern JavaScript frameworks and cloud infrastructure. Strong advocate for clean code, test-driven development, and continuous learning.

work.name: Tech Innovations Inc
work.description: Leading SaaS platform for business analytics
work.summary: Lead developer for the core platform team, responsible for architecture decisions and mentoring junior developers.
highlights: Architected and implemented microservices architecture serving 1M+ daily active users
Reduced API response time by 60% through database optimization and caching strategies
Mentored team of 5 junior developers and conducted code reviews
Led migration from monolithic application to containerized microservices using Docker and Kubernetes

work.name: StartupXYZ
work.summary: Full-stack development of customer-facing web application and internal tools.
highlights: Developed and launched e-commerce platform generating $2M+ in annual revenue
Implemented real-time inventory management system with 99.9% uptime
Built RESTful APIs consumed by web and mobile applications
Integrated payment processing with Stripe and PayPal

work.name: Digital Solutions Ltd
work.summary: Developed client websites and maintained existing applications.
highlights: Delivered 15+ client projects on time and within budget
Implemented responsive designs using modern CSS frameworks
Collaborated with designers to translate mockups into functional interfaces

volunteer.summary: Building web applications for non-profit organizations.
highlights: Developed volunteer management system for local food bank
Mentored high school students in web development workshops

awards.title: Employee of the Year
awards.summary: Recognized for outstanding contributions to platform architecture and team leadership

awards.title: Best Capstone Project
awards.summary: Awarded for developing an AI-powered chatbot for student services

publications.name: Building Scalable Microservices with Node.js
publications.summary: A comprehensive guide to designing and implementing microservices architecture using Node.js and Docker

references.name: John Johnson
references.reference: Jane is an exceptional developer with strong technical skills and great team collaboration abilities. She consistently delivers high-quality work and is always willing to help others.

projects.name: DevTools Dashboard
highlights: Built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
Integrates with GitHub, Jira, and Slack APIs

projects.name: Recipe Sharing Platform
projects.description: Community platform for sharing and discovering recipes
highlights: Image upload and processing with AWS S3
